snippet: Jonathan Gruber, an M.I.T. professor, appears in a video saying the American people were fooled about how the health care law works.
abstract: Series of videos emerge that show Massachusetts Institute of Technology Prof Jonathan Gruber calling American public 'stupid' and suggesting that health care reform law passed by fooling Americans about how it works; remarks by Gruber, who acted as consultant for law, have reignited furious Republican assault on the law.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Gruber, an M.I.T. professor, appears in a video saying the American people were fooled about how the health care law works.

headline.main: Affordable Care Act Supporter Ignites Fury With a Word: ‘Stupid’
headline.print_headline: Care Act Supporter Ignites Fury With a Word: ‘Stupid’

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
